name: victor-witkamp-resume
description: Professional resume of Victor Witkamp with automated PDF generation and Jekyll deployment

scripts.quality: npm run lint && npm run spell && npm run links
scripts.build:html: pandoc README.md -o RESUME.html --standalone --css=src/PDF_ATS.css --metadata title="Victor Witkamp - Resume"
scripts.build: npm run build:readme && npm run build:html && npm run build:pdf
scripts.clean: rm -f README.md RESUME.html RESUME.pdf && jekyll clean
scripts.test: npm run quality && npm run build && test -s RESUME.pdf && echo 'âœ… All tests passed'

author: Victor Witkamp
